title: Please help identify this beautiful calligraphic font(s)
content:
I'm looking to identify both of the fonts used on these cards. One is a script, the other is Gothic. I realize that these might be hand calligraphy, but if anyone could point me to reasonable look-a-like fonts, I'd be thriled!

Thank you!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fonts.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420101621/http:/typophile.com/files/fonts_11.jpg) | 458.18 KB |
author: barrettbot

comments.content:
I'm sorry to say these look all hand-drawn (all repeating letters are different).  
Alternatives for the script: [Compedium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420101621/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/compendium), [Bellisima Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420101621/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/bellissima-script-pro)  
Alternative for the blackletter: [Ecstasy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420101621/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/talavera/ecstasy)

If you want something that crusty you're going to have to get an actual calligrapher to do it.

hhp
